item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Introducing Veo 3 and Imagen 4, and a new tool for filmmaking called Flow (78 points | 20 comments)
2. Deep Learning Is Applied Topology (231 points | 123 comments)
3. Robin: A multi-agent system for automating scientific discovery (46 points | 9 comments)
4. Show HN: 90s.dev - game maker that runs on the web (127 points | 51 comments)
5. Show HN: A Tiling Window Manager for Windows, Written in Janet (118 points | 27 comments)
6. The Dawn of Nvidia's Technology (31 points | 4 comments)
7. 27000 Dragons and 10'000 Lights: GPU-Driven Clustered Forward Renderer (51 points | 14 comments)
8. Show HN: Juvio – UV Kernel for Jupyter (31 points | 12 comments)
9. Ashby (YC W19) Is Hiring Engineering Managers ( | hide)
10. The emoji problem (2022) (260 points | 40 comments)
11. Teachable Machine (30 points | 6 comments)
12. The Fractured Entangled Representation Hypothesis (29 points | 11 comments)
13. Show HN: Olelo Foil - NACA Airfoil Sim (10 points | 4 comments)
14. The Lisp in the Cellar: Dependent types that live upstairs [pdf] (59 points | 9 comments)
15. Launch HN: Opusense (YC X25) – AI assistant for construction inspectors on site (17 points | 6 comments)
16. Making Video Games (Without an Engine) in 2025 (418 points | 182 comments)
17. Production tests: a guidebook for better systems and more sleep (29 points | discuss)
18. A simple search engine from scratch (197 points | 40 comments)
19. The Last Letter (19 points | 4 comments)
20. Google is quietly giving Amazon a leg up in digital book sales (51 points | 23 comments)
21. llm-d, Kubernetes native distributed inference (75 points | 13 comments)
22. Effort and Challenges in Building Embedded Audio DSP Software Across Platforms (7 points | discuss)
23. OpenAI Codex Review (76 points | 32 comments)
24. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (790 points | 261 comments)
25. Compiling OCaml to the TI-84 CE Calculator (74 points | 3 comments)
26. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (596 points | 168 comments)
27. Hypervisor as a Library (25 points | 2 comments)
28. Show HN: Astra – a new js2exe compiler (41 points | 21 comments)
29. Show HN: Text to 3D simulation on a map (does history pretty well) (39 points | 34 comments)
30. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (478 points | 198 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
